偉蹟: (いせき) - remaining works; results of a man's labor (labour)
偏: (galinha/pássaro) - partial , left-hand radical of a character
偏する: (へんする) - to be biased; to be prejudiced; to be partial; to be one-sided
偏った考え: (かたよったかんがえ) - biased view; prejudice; one-sided view
偏り: (katayori) - desvio, inclinação, deslocamento, tendência, preconceito; polarização
偏りシリンダー: (かたよりシリンダー) - offset cylinder
偏り見る: (かたよりみる) - to show partiality
偏る: (かたよる) - to be one-sided; to incline; to be partial; to be prejudiced; to lean; to be biased; to be biassed
偏れる: (ふれる) - (振れる, 震れる only) to swing/to shake/to wave; to veer/to deflect/to lean towards
偏光: (へんこう) - polarized light; polarised light; polarization; polarisation
偏光プリズム: (へんこうプリズム) - polarizing prism
偏向: (へんこう) - propensity; tendency; inclination; deflection
偏向抄録: (へんこうしょうろく) - selective abstract; slanted abstract
偏向関係: (へんこうかんけい) - bias relation
偏在: (へんざい) - uneven distribution; unfair distribution; maldistribution; unevenly distributed
偏執狂: (へんしゅうきょう) - monomania; monomaniac
偏執症患者: (へんしつしょうかんじゃ) - paranoid (person)
偏導関数: (へんどうかんすう) - partial derivative
偏差値: (へんさち) - deviation value (usu. scaled to mean of 50, standard deviation of 10, and often used for academic grades); deviation; T-score; standard score
偏差値教育: (へんさちきょういく) - deviation-value-oriented education; education focussed on test results; education that stresses studying and passing exams to raise one's ranking; academic cramming
偏微分式: (へんびぶんしき) - partial differential equation
偏微分方程式: (へんびぶんほうていしき) - partial differential equation
偏心: (へんしん) - eccentricity (in mechanics, electronics, etc.)
偏性嫌気性菌: (へんせいけんきせいきん) - obligate anaerobe; strict anaerobe
偏旁: (へんぼう) - left and right kanji radicals; (now used for 冠, 脚, etc. as well) kanji radical positions
偏旁冠脚: (へんぼうかんきゃく) - (yoji) the radicals
偏東風: (へんとうふう) - easterlies; trade wind
偏波: (へんは) - polarisation; polarization; polarised wave; polarized wave
偏照り: (へんでり) - stretch of sunshine (after rain)
偏片: (かたはら) - one of a pair; one side
偏狭: (へんきょう) - narrow-mindedness; intolerance; illiberality; narrowness
偏芯: (へんしん) - eccentricity (in mechanics, electronics, etc.)
偏諱: (へんき) - one kanji in the name of a nobleperson (with a multiple-kanji name)
偏諱を賜う: (へんきをたまう) - (of a nobleperson) to bestow one of the kanji in one's name upon someone (e.g. a meritorious retainer, a boy coming of age, etc.)
偏辺: (かたほとり) - corner; remote country place
偏重: (へんじゅう) - preponderance; making too much of; overestimation; overemphasis; attaching too much importance to
偓促: (あくせく) - fussily; busily; sedulously; worrying about (small things)
偕楽: (かいらく) - enjoying oneself with others
偕老同穴: (かいろうどうけつ) - (yoji) happy life partnership; Venus's flower basket (species of sponge, Euplectella aspergillum)/Venus flower basket
停まる: (とどまる) - to remain/to abide/to stay (in the one place); to be limited to/to be confined to
停める: (とどめる) - to stop/to stay (e.g. the night)/to cease/to put an end to; to contain/to keep (in position, in place)/to limit; to record (e.g. a fact)/to retain
停会: (ていかい) - adjournment; suspension of a meeting; recess of legislature
停年: (ていねん) - retirement age; years of service in a military rank before eligibility for promotion
停年退職: (ていねんたいしょく) - retirement due to age
停戦ライン: (ていせんライン) - line of control
停戦協定: (ていせんきょうてい) - cease-fire deal
停止: (teishi) - stoppage, coming to a stop, halt, standstill; ceasing (movimento, atividade, etc.), suspension (of operations), interruption (e.g. of electricity supply), cutting off , stoppage, coming to a stop, halt, standstill; ceasing (movement, activity, etc.), suspension (of operations), interruption (e.g. of electricity supply), cutting off; suspension (of payment, licence, etc.), (temporary) prohibition, ban
停止信号: (ていししんごう) - stop signal; stoplight
停波: (ていは) - end of transmission (radio, television, telephony, etc.); closure of transmission
停滞: (teitai) - estagnação, paralisação, impasse, congestionamento, atraso, acúmulo, inadimplência
停滞前線: (ていたいぜんせん) - stationary weather front
停留場: (ていりゅうじょう) - stop (bus, streetcar, etc.)
停留所: (ていりゅうじょ) - bus stop; tram stop; stop; station

停留精巣: (ていりゅうせいそう) - {med} cryptorchidism; undescended testicle
